QuestData.Title: Karynaku
QuestData.Description: It shames me to ask for your assistance once more, $n, but you are my flight's only hope. Without my mate, the netherwing brood may die out completely.$B$BMake your way to the top of Dragonmaw Fortress and find Karynaku.$B$BWe will be flying overhead. Should a break appear in their defenses, the might of the netherwing will swoop down to assist you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Karynaku at Dragonmaw Fortress.
QuestData.RewardText: It is the chains. They sap my power. The only way is to get the key from Zuluhed and unbind me.
